text: Leon A. Katz (1931 – September 13, 1993) was an American politician who served in the New York City Council from 1970 to 1982. He died of a heart attack on September 13, 1993, in Englewood, New Jersey at age 62. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:1993 deaths Category:New York City Council members Category:New York (state) Democrats
title: Leon A. Katz
